flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: I covered a big balloon in paper mache, cut holes for my body, then added clay craters and painted it.  The front looks like the near side of the moon, with the Apollo 11 flag, and the back resembles the far side, with lots of craters and mountains.
guide.title: Moon Costume
